reviews.text: Victoria Station has always been the most remarkable Station in the whole of the UK in my opinion. It is a huge travel connection hub between Central London and just about all southern or metropolitan areas. The facilities are top notch. The Food availability is wonderful. Everything is efficient. Staff aren't bad.

Stop Press - The new refurbished toilets are up and running. Right off the bat, I've found Victoria Station staff to be pretty helpful, so if you need information just ask! Based on connectivity alone Victoria is a hugely important railway station in Central London. It has great underground and bus connections. It is only a short walk from Victoria Coach Station, which operates scheduled services across the UK and Northern Europe. Please note that at the time of writing the public toilets were being renovated, free temporary facilities are available just outside the station.

Victoria Station is HUGE! I loved coming through here during my visit to London. It was easy to find my way around, the help desk staff were fantastic, and the style of the station was delightful. I can't wait to come back. #letsguide

On behalf of my wife.
The man in the office next to m&s was very patient and delivered great service. He was an African man  - he was very helpful said my wife who is difficult to please.
Staff very helpful when lines were closed the other day due to trespasser on the line. Helped me get home via another station as I don't know London that well! Thankyou.
